abstract.t: The Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP)provides a standard method for transporting multi-protocol datagrams over point-to-point links.
This document defines a method for negotiating and using Numbered-Mode, as defined by ISO 7776, to provide a reliable serial link.
This document is the product of the Point-to-Point Protocol Working Group of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). Comments should be submitted to the ietf-ppp@ucdavis.edu mailing list.
